title: Understanding Sparklines
text: Sparklines are small, simple charts that fit in a single cell and provide a visual representation of data trends.

title: Locating the Sparkline Option
text: To add a sparkline, you need to find the option in the Insert tab of the Excel ribbon.

hintAnswer: select the cell, then click line sparkline (insert|sparkline)
title: Steps to Add a Sparkline
text: First, select the cell where you want the sparkline to appear. Then, navigate to the Insert tab and choose the Line Sparkline option.
choices: select the cell, then click line sparkline (insert
